content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-15.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 19.5), and (-19.5, 22.5)

### Laboratory at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities (unchanged from previous report):
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities (unchanged from previous report):
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to research without required items
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to research technologies. In this case, you need automation-science-pack to research electronics.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when lab is not powered
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source to avoid the "no power" status.
